abstract: Andy Webster reviews animated movie Ratchet & Clank,

headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Ratchet & Clank,’ a Stale Tale Based on a PlayStation Game
headline.main: Review: ‘Ratchet & Clank,’ a Stale Tale Based on a PlayStation Game

snippet: The movie has little story to tell and few ideas to offer, but a great deal of product to sell.
lead_paragraph: The movie has little story to tell and few ideas to offer, but a great deal of product to sell.
